name: 邱品逢
objective:
進階冰水主機實習、進階冷凍工程實習、進階中央空調系統實習、空調設備工程品質管理實務、進階空調工程實習。
Advanced practices and experiments of water chiller unit, refrigeration engineering, central air conditioning system, quality control of air conditioning facilities, and air conditioning engineering.
